name: Sandara: City of a Thousand Eclipses
storyline:
You are old enough now. Old enough to leave the Isle of Children. Old enough to understand Elderspeech. Old enough to be a productive member of society. Old enough to move to the Monolith.
Your assigned Elder will teach you how to earn your keep. Work diligently, meet your quota, and keep your head down. The City knows your every action, sees your every move, and listens to every whisper. Do not fail it, or it might just end up devouring you.
summary: Use your cards to roleplay in a harsh world where your home is slowly sinking into the sands. Enter the city of Sandara and build your deck, make allies, enhance your abilities, and manage your resources before the eclipse ends your life.
